verses.verse: And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1129>Build<s%> me <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>oxen<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> and <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> every <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram.<s%>

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H3320>Stand<s%> by your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and I will <S%H3212>go:<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7136>come<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> me: and <S%H1697>whatever<s%> <S%H4100><s%> he <S%H7200>shows<s%> me I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you. And he <S%H3212>went<s%> to an <S%H8205>high<s%> place.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, I have <S%H6186>prepared<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and I have <S%H5927>offered<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in <S%H1109>Balaam's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H3541>thus<s%> you shall <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to him, and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> he <S%H5324>stood<s%> by his <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifice, he, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> has <S%H5148>brought<s%> me from <S%H758>Aram,<s%> out of the <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of the <S%H6924>east,<s%> saying, <S%H3212>Come,<s%> <S%H779>curse<s%> me <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H3212>come,<s%> <S%H2194>defy<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> shall I <S%H5344>curse,<s%> whom <S%H410>God<s%> has not <S%H6895>cursed?<s%> or <S%H4100>how<s%> shall I <S%H2194>defy,<s%> whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H2194>defied?<s%>

For from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> him, and from the <S%H1389>hills<s%> I <S%H7789>behold<s%> him: <S%H2005>see,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H909>alone,<s%> and shall not be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H4487>count<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7255>fourth<s%> part of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> Let me <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3477>righteous,<s%> and let my <S%H319>last<s%> end be <S%H3644>like<s%> his!

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have you <S%H6213>done<s%> to me? I <S%H3947>took<s%> you to <S%H6895>curse<s%> my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them altogether.
And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Must I not take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7760>put<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth?<s%>

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Come,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, with me to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> from from <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you may <S%H7200>see<s%> them: you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> but the <S%H7097>utmost<s%> part of them, and shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> them <S%H3605>all:<s%> and <S%H6895>curse<s%> me them from <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>brought<s%> him into the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6839>Zophim,<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> every <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H3320>Stand<s%> <S%H3541>here<s%> by your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, while I <S%H7136>meet<s%> the LORD <S%H3541>yonder.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>Go<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H3541>thus.<s%>

And when he <S%H935>came<s%> to him, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H5324>stood<s%> by his <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> with him. And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Rise<s%> up, <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear;<s%> <S%H238>listen<s%> to me, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor:<s%>

<S%H410>God<s%> is not a <S%H376>man,<s%> that he should <S%H3576>lie;<s%> neither the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> that he should <S%H5162>repent:<s%> has he <S%H559>said,<s%> and shall he not <S%H6213>do<s%> it? or has he <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> and shall he not make it <S%H6965>good?<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H3947>received<s%> commandment to <S%H1288>bless:<s%> and he has <S%H1288>blessed;<s%> and I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H7725>reverse<s%> it.

He has not <S%H5027>beheld<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> has he <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5999>perverseness<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> is with him, and the <S%H8643>shout<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is among them.
<S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> he has as it were the <S%H8443>strength<s%> of an <S%H7214>unicorn.<s%>

Surely there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5172>enchantment<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is there any <S%H7081>divination<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> according to this <S%H6256>time<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> has <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6466>worked!<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> up as a <S%H3833>great<s%> <S%H3833>lion,<s%> and <S%H5375>lift<s%> up himself as a young <S%H738>lion:<s%> he shall not <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain.<s%>
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H1571>Neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H6895>curse<s%> them at all, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> them at all.

But <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1696>Told<s%> not I you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>speaks,<s%> that I must <S%H6213>do?<s%>

And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, I will <S%H3947>bring<s%> you to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> it will <S%H3477>please<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> that you may <S%H6895>curse<s%> me them from <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor,<s%> that <S%H8259>looks<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3452>Jeshimon.<s%>

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1129>Build<s%> me <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>
And <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H559>said,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> every <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
